title: wtf is this forum
body:
It's so cluttered, the colors are not easy on the eyes, it's hard to sort through what is what.

It seriously looks like it was designed by a middle school kid as his first attempt.  

Please fix dawgs.

replies.body: I see what they are trying to do.    But.... i do not like the color scheme.

Stfu Riot knows what you want better than you. So here we are. 

In all seriousness though I hate this place and agree with you. BRING BACK THE OLD FORUMS.
Or you could appreciate for once what they've given us?

What's there to appreciate? It's annoying.

Unless you just want us to appreciate things we don't like, in which case that's just silly.
